query:
SELECT 
            s.id as "id!",
            s.metadata_id as "metadata_id!",
            s.deal_id as "deal_id!",
            m.root_cid as "root_cid!",
            m.metadata_cid as "metadata_cid!",
            m.data_size as "data_size!"
        FROM 
            snapshots s
        INNER JOIN 
            metadata m ON m.id = s.metadata_id
        WHERE 
            s.id = $1 AND m.bucket_id = $2;
